| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  | **Area: MDB Automatic Spout Inserter Machine** | | | | | | |
| Conveyor Belt | - | Check tension, damage condition & magnetic force  Replace if necessary. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Pouch Picking Device | - | Check the height position of the pouch-picking frame is in line with belt and the condition of the vacuum sucker. Replace sucker if necessary. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Pouch Feed Device | - | Check the front & back of rubber roller is parallel condition and the condition of axial serial small belt. Adjust if necessary. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Gear Speed Reducer | - | Check quantity of Lubricating oil.  Replace with Foodlube Multi-Paste Spray  (NSF H1 – 121613) | Quarterly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Angle Cutter | - | Check if Damaged & replace if necessary. | Weekly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Spout Feed Device | - | Check if spout feeder positioning device is connected with the turning cylinder. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| First Sealer | - | Visually check the running condition and product sealing condition. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Second Sealer | - | Visually check the running condition and product sealing condition. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Cooling Sealer | - | Visually check the running condition and product sealing condition. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Cooler Bar – Fittings/Connections for pipes | Replacement Fittings & Thread Tape | Check to see if fittings/connections are intact and free of any leaks that pose potential risk to product. Replace with new fitting if necessary. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist | - |
| PLC | - | Check to see if the joint and battery are connected. | Annually | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Water Pipe, valve and joint. | - | Check to see if there is any leaking and replace if necessary. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Vacuum System | - | Check to see if there is any leaking. Pay attention to small leakages if any, replace piping if necessary. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Vacuum Filter | - | Check to see if filter is clean. Replace if necessary. | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Air Tank | - | Check to see if there is any leaking. Pay attention to small leakages if any, replace piping if necessary.  Drain air tank of water. | Weekly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Air Reticulation | - | Drain water traps & check oil level. If oil is below acceptable level fill up pot with Foodlube Hi-Power Compressor and Arline Oil | Weekly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Thermo Couple Connections | Screw Driver | Check & fasten loose couples & check that the wires don’t get in front of moving parts. | Bi Annually | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Teflon (Sealing & Cooling Surfaces) | Teflon | Check if Teflon is not torn and that no poly build up is present and replace if necessary | Weekly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Pneumatic Silencers | None | Check & replace if necessary | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Cooling Unit Air Filter & Radiator | Vacuum | Vacuum clean | Monthly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Cooling Water Solution | - | Replace the water solution, see cooling unit manual | Annually | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
| Packing Table | - | Check the condition of table and ensure that is it free of foreign objects. Ensure condition of table is that so no contamination will occur. Repair surface if any damage to surface | Weekly | Day Shift Operator | 4.7F9 | Maintenance Checklist MDB | - |
